thread.title: Canton Flea Market turns 50 this year
thread.title_full: Canton Flea Market turns 50 this year - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Canton Flea Market turns 50 this year
text:
CANTON, Miss. (AP) - The Canton Flea Market turns 50 this year.
The semi-annual show is held the first Thursday of each May and October, with the fall show set for Thursday.
The Clarion-Ledger reports ( http://on.thec-l.com/1LdkD4a ) what started with a dozen or so local artists - all women - hanging their paintings on the iron fence along the outside of the Courthouse lawn has not only grown but also flourished beyond any expectations that early group could have imagined.
The renamed Canton Flea Market Arts and Crafts Show has been named a Top 100 Event in North America by the American Bus Association, Top Ten Out of Twenty event by the Southeast Tourism Society and several other publications.
The semi-annual event attacks more than 1,000 vendors and crowds can top 60,000.
Information from: The Clarion-Ledger, http://www.clarionledger.com
